shortDescription: Free porn addiction recovery - Track sobriety, log urges, and build healthier habits with complete privacy
fullDescription:
üõ°Ô∏è RECOVER FROM PORN ADDICTION - 100% FREE & PRIVATE

Quittr is a compassionate, evidence-based recovery companion designed to help you break free from pornography addiction. Unlike other apps, Quittr is completely free with no subscriptions, no account required, and all your data stays on your device.

‚è±Ô∏è SOBRIETY COUNTER
‚Ä¢ Real-time tracking of your recovery journey (days, hours, minutes, seconds)
‚Ä¢ Milestone celebrations at key recovery points (1, 3, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90+ days)
‚Ä¢ Progress visualization to keep you motivated

üÜò PANIC BUTTON
‚Ä¢ Instant support during intense urges and cravings
‚Ä¢ Multi-step intervention with breathing exercises
‚Ä¢ Grounding techniques (5-4-3-2-1 method)
‚Ä¢ Motivational reminders of your reasons for change
‚Ä¢ Distraction activities to redirect your focus

üìä URGE TRACKING
‚Ä¢ Log urges with intensity levels (1-10 scale)
‚Ä¢ Track your triggers (stress, boredom, loneliness, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Monitor your resistance rate over time
‚Ä¢ Identify patterns to prevent future relapses
‚Ä¢ Earn XP (+10) for each resisted urge

üìì DAILY JOURNAL
‚Ä¢ Daily writing prompts for self-reflection
‚Ä¢ Mood, energy, and sleep tracking
‚Ä¢ Check-in system to monitor well-being
‚Ä¢ Private space to process your thoughts
‚Ä¢ XP rewards for consistent journaling

üèÜ GAMIFICATION & MOTIVATION
‚Ä¢ Level up system with XP rewards
‚Ä¢ 17+ achievements to unlock
‚Ä¢ Visual progress tracking
‚Ä¢ Milestone badges for key recovery points

üîí PRIVACY FIRST
‚Ä¢ No account or sign-up required
‚Ä¢ All data stored locally on your device
‚Ä¢ No analytics or tracking
‚Ä¢ Optional PIN lock for extra security
‚Ä¢ Biometric authentication support
‚Ä¢ App disguise feature to hide the app

üíô COMPASSIONATE RECOVERY
‚Ä¢ Non-judgmental, supportive approach
‚Ä¢ Science-based recovery techniques
‚Ä¢ Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) principles
‚Ä¢ Focus on progress, not perfection
‚Ä¢ "Slip" vs "relapse" mindset

üåü WHY CHOOSE QUITTR?

‚úì 100% FREE - No subscriptions, no hidden costs
‚úì No account needed - Start immediately
‚úì Complete privacy - Your data never leaves your phone
‚úì Evidence-based - Built on addiction science
‚úì Compassionate - Supportive, not shaming
‚úì Offline first - Works without internet

Recovery is possible. Every day is a new opportunity to become the person you want to be. Start your journey today with Quittr.

‚ö†Ô∏è DISCLAIMER: Quittr is a recovery support tool, not a replacement for professional help. If you're struggling, please seek support from a qualified mental health professional.
